startPageTitle: Tell Companies House you have verified someone’s identity
useThisService: Use this service to tell us when you've verified someone's identity for Companies House.
YouWillBeAble: You'll be able to add other people who work for the business once you have registered.
youllNeed: You’ll need to tell us the person's:
youAlsoNeed: You’ll also need to tell us which identity documents you used to verify their identity and the date you completed the checks.
outLines: outlines which documents you can use to verify someone’s identity and the checks you’ll need to do to meet the standard.
startTimeout: It takes around 10 minutes to use this service.
readThe: Read the guidance about verifying someone's identity for Companies House
